summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 14%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (up 8 mbar), cloud levels (up 486 m), and light levels (up 4185 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), cloud levels (up 171 m), and light levels (up 2502 lux) when compared to today.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 397m and a peak of 2140m, averaging 781.0m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; hot temperatures will prevail. Also, very clammy and humid and breezy at times. A few light raindrops may fall, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and sunlight will be very intense and bright. Weather could become unsettled.
